   17: -module(edoc_SUITE).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   20: 
   21: %% Test server specific exports
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: %% Test cases
   26: -export([app/1,appup/1,build_std/1,build_map_module/1,otp_12008/1,
   27:          build_app/1, otp_14285/1, infer_module_app_test/1,
   28:          module_with_feature/1, module_with_maybe/1]).
   29: 
   30: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [app,appup,build_std,build_map_module,otp_12008, build_app, otp_14285,
   34:      infer_module_app_test, module_with_feature].
   35: 
   36: groups() -> 
   37:     [].
   38: 
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   43:     ok.
   44: 
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: %% Test that the .app file does not contain any `basic' errors
   52: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   53:     ok = test_server:app_test(edoc).
   54: 
   55: %% Test that the .appup file does not contain any `basic' errors
   56: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   57:     ok = test_server:appup_test(edoc).
   58: 
   59: build_std(suite) -> [];
   60: build_std(doc) -> ["Build some documentation using standard EDoc layout"];
   61: build_std(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   62:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
   63:     Overview1 = filename:join(DataDir, "overview.edoc"),
   64:     Overview2 = filename:join(DataDir, "overview.syntax_tools"),
   65:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   66: 
   67:     ok = edoc:application(edoc, [{preprocess,true},{overview, Overview1},
   68: 	    {def, {vsn,"TEST"}},
   69: 	    {dir, PrivDir}]),
   70: 
   71:     ok = edoc:application(syntax_tools, [{overview, Overview2},
   72: 	    {def, {vsn,"TEST"}},
   73: 	    {dir, PrivDir}]),
   74: 
   75:     MF = fun(_MacroArg="", _Line, _Env) -> "TEST" end,
   76:     ok = edoc:application(syntax_tools, [{overview, Overview2},
   77: 	    {def, {vsn,MF}},
   78: 	    {dir, PrivDir}]),
   79: 
   80:     ok = edoc:application(xmerl, [{preprocess,true},{dir, PrivDir}]),
   81:     ok.
   82: 
   83: build_map_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   84:     DataDir  = ?config(data_dir, Config),
   85:     PrivDir  = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   86:     Filename = filename:join(DataDir, "map_module.erl"),
   87:     ok = edoc:file(Filename, [{dir, PrivDir}]),
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: otp_12008(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   91:     DataDir  = ?config(data_dir, Config),
   92:     PrivDir  = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   93:     Un1 = filename:join(DataDir, "un1.erl"),
   94:     Un2 = filename:join(DataDir, "un2.erl"),
   95:     Un3 = filename:join(DataDir, "un3.erl"),
   96:     %% epp_dodger
   97:     Opts1 = [{dir, PrivDir}],
   98:     ok = edoc:files([Un1], Opts1),
   99:     ok = edoc:files([Un2], Opts1),
  100:     {'EXIT', error} = (catch edoc:files([Un3], Opts1)),
  101:     %% epp
  102:     Opts2 = [{preprocess, true}, {dir, PrivDir}],
  103:     ok = edoc:files([Un1], Opts2),
  104:     ok = edoc:files([Un2], Opts2),
  105:     {'EXIT', error} = (catch edoc:files([Un3], Opts2)),
  106:     ok.
  107: 
  108: build_app(suite) -> [];
  109: build_app(doc) -> ["Build a local app with nested source directories"];
  110: build_app(Config) ->
  111:     DataDir  = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  112:     PrivDir  = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  113: 	OutDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "myapp"),
  114: 	Src = filename:join(DataDir, "myapp"),
  115: 
  116: 	ok = edoc:application(myapp, Src, [{dir, OutDir}, {subpackages, false}]),
  117: 	true = filelib:is_regular(filename:join(OutDir, "a.html")),
  118: 	false = filelib:is_regular(filename:join(OutDir, "b.html")),
  119: 
  120: 	ok = edoc:application(myapp, Src, [{dir, OutDir}]),
  121: 	true = filelib:is_regular(filename:join(OutDir, "a.html")),
  122: 	true = filelib:is_regular(filename:join(OutDir, "b.html")),
  123: 	ok.
  124: 
  125: otp_14285(Config) ->
  126:     DataDir  = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  127:     PrivDir  = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  128:     Un1 = filename:join(DataDir, "un_atom1.erl"),
  129:     Un2 = filename:join(DataDir, "un_atom2.erl"),
  130:     %% epp_dodger
  131:     Opts1 = [{dir, PrivDir}],
  132:     ok = edoc:files([Un1], Opts1),
  133:     ok = edoc:files([Un2], Opts1),
  134:     %% epp
  135:     Opts2 = [{preprocess, true}, {dir, PrivDir}],
  136:     ok = edoc:files([Un1], Opts2),
  137:     ok = edoc:files([Un2], Opts2),
  138:     ok.
  139: 
  140: infer_module_app_test(_Config) ->
  141:     Modules = lists:map(fun ({M, _, _}) ->
  142: 				{list_to_atom(M), M ++ ".beam"}
  143: 			end, code:all_available()),
  144:     true = lists:all(fun infer_module_app_test_/1, Modules).
  145: 
  146: infer_module_app_test_({M, Beam}) ->
  147:     case edoc_lib:infer_module_app(M) of
  148: 	no_app ->
  149: 	    true;
  150: 	{app, App} when is_atom(App) ->
  151: 	    %% When `App' is actually returned, the corresponding
  152: 	    %% BEAM file is expected to be found on disk in the app's
  153: 	    %% ebin dir.
  154: 	    BeamPath = filename:join([code:lib_dir(App), "ebin", Beam]),
  155:             filelib:is_regular(BeamPath)
  156:     end.
  157: 
  158: module_with_feature(Config) ->
  159:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  160:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  161:     Source = filename:join(DataDir, "module_with_feature.erl"),
  162:     DodgerOpts = [{dir, PrivDir}],
  163:     ok = edoc:files([Source], DodgerOpts),
  164:     PreprocessOpts = [{preprocess, true}, {dir, PrivDir}],
  165:     ok = edoc:files([Source], PreprocessOpts),
  166:     ok.
  167: 
  168: module_with_maybe(Config) ->
  169:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  170:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  171:     Source = filename:join(DataDir, "module_with_maybe.erl"),
  172:     DodgerOpts = [{dir, PrivDir}],
  173:     ok = edoc:files([Source], DodgerOpts),
  174:     PreprocessOpts = [{preprocess, true}, {dir, PrivDir}],
  175:     ok = edoc:files([Source], PreprocessOpts),
  176:     ok.
